member.name: IP_ADAPTER_ANYCAST_ADDRESS
member.summary: TheIP_ADAPTER_ANYCAST_ADDRESS structure stores a single anycast IP address in a linked list of addresses for a particular adapter.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_ANYCAST_ADDRESS.Alignment
member.summary: Reserved. Used by the compiler to align the structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_ANYCAST_ADDRESS.Length
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of this structure.

summary.para: The flags for this anycast IP address.
The following table shows possible values. These constants are defined in the Iptypes.h header file.

listheader.description: The IP address is legal to appear in DNS.
The IP address is a cluster address and should not be used by most applications.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_ANYCAST_ADDRESS.Next
member.summary: A pointer to the next anycast IP address structure in the list.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_ANYCAST_ADDRESS.Address
member.summary: The IP address for this anycast IP address entry. This member can be an IPv6 address or an IPv4 address.
